name: Kiddie Frog Math
description:
I tried uploading the zipped file into itch.io... but it doesnt work. So I hope you peeps dont mind to go to my own website or download it....

Here is the link, its not a paid website to I coudnt chose a better name. https://papaya-hummingbird-6389ca.netlify.app/

____________________________________________________________________________

I made a math game for kids 4 -5 years old.
The goal is to give correct answers so the frog can grow from egg to king frog within 100 seconds..
